subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett were brought to Brooklyn for moments like Friday’s Game 3, the former bringing his trademark cool in the clutch and the latter generating his heat to fire up the masses.
snippet: Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett were brought to Brooklyn for moments like Friday’s Game 3, the former bringing his trademark cool in the clutch and the latter generating his heat to fire up the masses.
